text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The threat of coronavirus from China may reboot in India w/ a real potential to be its 2nd wind that is perhaps already out of control.High pop.density+bad hygiene may=hundreds of millions w/the virus there+recurrence in US+world and must be stopped now-in time 2 save many lives.
